languages.text: Древнее чудовище покинуло свою темницу. Прежде чем оно вырвется в мир во всей своей разрушительной мощи, его необходимо остановить и сковать.
The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.
languages.original_text: Древнее чудовище покинуло свою темницу. Прежде чем оно вырвется в мир во всей своей разрушительной мощи, его необходимо остановить и сковать.

traits.locale_text: The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.
The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.
The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.
The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.

languages.text: La monstruosité millénaire a quitté sa prison. Cette entité doit être arrêtée et enfermée à nouveau avant qu'elle ne puisse déchaîner sa puissance dévastatrice sur le monde.
languages.original_text: The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.

traits.locale_text: La monstruosité millénaire a quitté sa prison. Cette entité doit être arrêtée et enfermée à nouveau avant qu'elle ne puisse déchaîner sa puissance dévastatrice sur le monde.

languages.text: 这只远古怪物已经从囚牢中挣脱了束缚。行商浪人必须阻止这只怪物，以免它向这个世界释放足以毁灭万物的力量。
languages.original_text: The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.

traits.locale_text: 这只远古怪物已经从囚牢中挣脱了束缚。行商浪人必须阻止这只怪物，以免它向这个世界释放足以毁灭万物的力量。

languages.text: 古代の怪物が牢獄を抜け出した。世界を絶滅させるほどの威力をもって惑星へと飛び出す前に、この怪物を止めて鎖につないでおかなければならない。
languages.original_text: The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.

traits.locale_text: 古代の怪物が牢獄を抜け出した。世界を絶滅させるほどの威力をもって惑星へと飛び出す前に、この怪物を止めて鎖につないでおかなければならない。

languages.text: Die uralte Monstrosität hat ihr Gefängnis verlassen. Diese Entität muss aufgehalten und gefesselt werden, bevor sie mit all ihrer zerstörerischen Macht in die Welt ausbrechen kann.
languages.original_text: The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.

traits.locale_text: Die uralte Monstrosität hat ihr Gefängnis verlassen. Diese Entität muss aufgehalten und gefesselt werden, bevor sie mit all ihrer zerstörerischen Macht in die Welt ausbrechen kann.

languages.text: El antiguo monstruo ha salido de su prisión. Hay que detener a esta criatura y encadenarla antes de que desate su poder aniquilador contra el mundo.
languages.original_text: The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.

traits.locale_text: El antiguo monstruo ha salido de su prisión. Hay que detener a esta criatura y encadenarla antes de que desate su poder aniquilador contra el mundo.

languages.text: Kadim garabet serbest kaldı. Bu varlık, yok edici gücüyle dünyaya adım atmadan önce durdurulup zincire vurulmalı.
languages.original_text: The ancient monstrosity has left its prison. This entity must be stopped and chained before it can break out into the world in all its annihilating might.
